publicationStmt.ab: Distributed via the GitHub repository https://github.com/lb42/KJV_1611

sourceDesc.ab: The transcription was downloaded from the website www.kingjamesbibleonline.org on March 18 and the resulting web files reprocessed by a variety of tools to produce a TEI conformant XML version.

revisionDesc.change: Added several chapters which had been incorrectly downloaded
Added TEI Header and titlepage from Wikimedia

docTitle.titlePart: THE HOLY BIBLE, Conteyning the Old Teſtament, AND THE NEW:

titlePage.titlePart: Newly Tranſlated out of the Originall tongues: & with the former Tranſlations diligently compared and reuiſed, by his Maiesties speciall Comandement.
Appointed to be read in Churches.
titlePage.docImprint: Imprinted at London by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings moſt Excellent Maiestie. ANNO DOM. 1611 .

div.head: The Genealogies Recorded in the Sacred Scriptures, according to euery Family & Tribe.
With the line of our Sauiour Ieſus Chriſt observed from Adam, to the Blessed Virgin Mary
By J.S.
Cum Priuilegio.
The names and order of all the Bookes of the Old and New Testament, with the Number of their Chapters.
